title: Pilates
descreption: Pilates largely avoids high impact, high power output, and heavy muscular and skeletal loading.

title: Lifting
descreption: A training that aims to develop physical strength and strengthen the body by lifting weights

title: TaBaTa
descreption: Interval training that combines both strength and endurance. The workout works on pulse cycles and high periodicity, which results in increased calorie burning.

title: Hiit
descreption: Interval training that combines both strength and endurance. The workout works on pulse cycles and high periodicity, which results in increased calorie burning.

title: BootCamp
descreption: Excellent training for improving cardio-pulmonary endurance, strength and flexibility. The training will pass with groovy music.

title: Fanctional training
descreption: Functional training is based on mobility and body training as a whole, combining muscle groups, using exercises that simulate initial movement patterns.

title: Fit kids
descreption: Training for kids under 12 years old and training for the whole family.
